001package imagingbook.lib.util.choice;
002
003/**
004 * A usage example for the mechanism provided by the {@link Choices} interface.
005 * The enclosing class (or interface) contains concrete inner classes
006 * that are marked as choices by the {@link DeclareChoice} annotation.
007 * The inner classes must be static and must extend the enclosing class.
008 * @author WB
009 *
010 */
011public abstract class ExampleWithChoices implements Choices {
012        
013        // Concrete subclasses/choices to be instantiated:
014        
015        @DeclareChoice
016        public static class ChoiceA extends ExampleWithChoices {
017                // ...
018        }
019        @DeclareChoice("I love to be chosen")
020        public static class ChoiceB extends ExampleWithChoices {
021                // ...
022        }
023        
024        @DeclareChoice("The Choice C")
025        public static class ChoiceC extends ExampleWithChoices {
026                // ...
027        }
028        
029        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
030        
031        public static void main(String[] args) {
032                for (Class<? extends ExampleWithChoices> c : Choices.getChoices(ExampleWithChoices.class)) {
033                        System.out.println("choice = " + c.getSimpleName() + " / " + Choices.getChoiceName(c));
034                        
035                        ExampleWithChoices instance = Choices.getInstance(c);
036                        System.out.println("instance = " + instance.getClass().getName());
037                        // do something more with instance ...
038                }
039        }
040
041}
